alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:48AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lackawanna and southwestern Wayne Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1247 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gouldsboro, or 10 miles south of Scranton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moscow, Lehigh, Gouldsboro, Springbrook Corners, Daleville, Yostville, Quicktown and Fells Corners. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 380 between 20 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
